T02D2465:141a-1: tsitta ratna bi sho dha n'am m'a rga lam /
T02D2465:141a-3: sems rin po che spyang ba'i lam 'bras /
T02D2465:141a-4: rje btsun mi pham mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2465:141a-5: rnyed dka'i dal 'byor myur du 'jig / las dang de 'bras sdug bsngal yin //
T02D2465:141a-6: de spong shes rab snying rje bsgom //
T02D2465:141a-7: skyes gsum lam gyis don gsum thob //
T02D2465:141a-8: dam pa gsum gyis bsod nams bsags //
T02D2465:141a-9: rgya chen thabs kyis yang dag spel //
T02D2465:141a-10: shes rab zab mos rnam dag bya //
T02D2465:141a-11: zung 'jug bsngo bas rgyas gdab bo //
T02D2465:141a-12: kha che'i rigs las bal yul du sku 'khrungs pa'i
T02D2465:141a-13: pandi ta chen po dpal lnga rig pa'i mchog buddh'a
T02D2465:141a-14: shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa sems rin
T02D2465:141a-15: po che spyang ba'i lam 'bras zhes bya ba rdzogs
T02D2465:141a-17: / mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar
T02D2465:141a-18: lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bal yul yam
